channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dear Pentathletes: Enjoy Your Last Ride. Get Ready for the Obstacle Course.
item.description: Pentathlon will trade show jumping for an obstacle course in 2028, after accusations of horse mistreatment in Tokyo. Athletes aren’t thrilled. But they could have been pillow fighting.

item.title: Dear Pentathletes: Enjoy Your Last Ride. Get Ready for the Obstacle Course.
item.description: Pentathlon will trade show jumping for an obstacle course in 2028, after accusations of horse mistreatment in Tokyo. Athletes aren’t thrilled. But they could have been pillow fighting.

item.title: Iranians are creating fake websites and impersonating activists to create chaos in the U.S., Microsoft found
item.description: Microsoft's report revealed its findings that suggest Iran is evolving its tactics for another election that’s likely to have global implications.

item.title: Bangladesh Puts Its Eggs in One Economic Basket. Now, a Reckoning.
item.description: Garment exports lifted the country to new heights. But overreliance on that industry also helped bring down Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina.

item.title: Bangladesh Puts Its Eggs in One Economic Basket. Now, a Reckoning.
item.description: Garment exports lifted the country to new heights. But overreliance on that industry also helped bring down Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina.

item.title: Customer service chatbots are buggy and disliked by consumers. Can AI make them better?
item.description: Speakers at Fortune Brainstorm AI Singapore shared how how they're already using AI to make customer service faster and more useful.

item.title: How Economic Grievances Were Exploited in Britain’s Violent Unrest
item.description: Nationalist hatred has been linked to forces like stagnant wages and declining services, even though research shows immigration helps many economies.

item.title: China’s Great Wall of Villages
item.description: China has moved thousands of people to new settlements on its frontiers. It calls them “border guardians.”

item.title: VoePass plane suddenly drops from the sky and crashes in Brazil, killing all 61 on board
item.description: The aircraft involved in the crash was an ATR 72 model, a twin-engine turboprop model that typically seats about 70 people. ATR is a joint venture between Airbus SE and Italy’s Leonardo SpA.

item.title: Famed Double Arch Collapses in Glen Canyon National Recreation Area
item.description: Changing water levels and erosion are believed to have contributed to the collapse of the geologic feature, which was formed from 190 million-year-old Navajo sandstone, the National Park Service said.

item.title: Doug Emhoff Stresses a Personal Push Against Antisemitism
item.description: At an event in Paris to commemorate a 1982 attack on a Jewish deli there, Kamala Harris’s husband said, “Part of fighting hate is living openly and proudly as a Jew.”

item.title: Railroad giant threatens to revoke workers’ hard-won schedule improvements
item.description: The $145 billion Union Pacific railroad offered paid sick days for the first time last year and they helped make the attendance system more manageable, but not being able to plan on their days off still takes a toll on engineers.

item.title: As Ukraine Pushes Deeper Into Russia, Moscow Sends Reinforcements
item.description: The Ukrainian police said they were evacuating people, perhaps in anticipation of a retaliatory strike, but the goal of the military operation on Russian territory remained unclear.

item.title: As Ukraine Pushes Deeper Into Russia, Moscow Sends Reinforcements
item.description: The Ukrainian police said they were evacuating people, perhaps in anticipation of a retaliatory strike, but the goal of the military operation on Russian territory remained unclear.

item.title: Biden reverses policy on weapons sales to Saudi Arabia as Mideast war upends U.S. priorities
item.description: Saudi Arabia is now deemed too important to US goals to end the Israel-Hamas war and in the growing conflict with Iran and its proxies.
